ComicInfo.Summary:
After William and Rita announce their engagement, Alex reconciles with Chris, prompting She-Dragon to seek a cure for Bludgeon's monstrous condition amongst Johnny Redbeard's leftover machinery, in order to win back Chris' attention.
Notes:
The cover is a homage of the cover of Giant-Size X-Men #1.
